mapper.insert: insert into work_evaluate (woe_id, evaluate_no, evaluate_by, evaluate_type, evaluate_date, enabled_mark, auditor_by, auditor_date, evaluate_consultant, consultant_id, evaluate_supervisor, supervisor_id, evaluate_wash, washer_id, status, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, evaluate_info, wpo_id) values (#{woeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaluateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaluateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaluateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{evaluateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enabledMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditorBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditorDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{evaluateConsultant,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{consultantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaluateSupervisor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supervisorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaluateWash,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{washerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaluateInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{wpoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update work_evaluate set evaluate_no = #{evaluateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate_by = #{evaluateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate_type = #{evaluateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, evaluate_date = #{evaluateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enabled_mark = #{enabledMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, auditor_by = #{auditorBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auditor_date = #{auditorDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, evaluate_consultant = #{evaluateConsultant,jdbcType=INTEGER}, consultant_id = #{consultantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate_supervisor = #{evaluateSupervisor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supervisor_id = #{consultantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate_wash = #{evaluateWash,jdbcType=INTEGER}, washer_id = #{consultantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_Id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate_info = #{evaluateInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, wpo_id = #{wpoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where woe_id = #{woeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select woe_id, evaluate_no, evaluate_by, evaluate_type, evaluate_date, enabled_mark, wpo_id, auditor_by, auditor_date, evaluate_consultant, consultant_id, evaluate_supervisor, supervisor_id, evaluate_wash, washer_id, status, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, evaluate_info from work_evaluate where woe_id = #{woeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select woe_id, evaluate_no, evaluate_by, evaluate_type, evaluate_date, enabled_mark, wpo_id, auditor_by, auditor_date, evaluate_consultant, consultant_id, evaluate_supervisor, supervisor_id, evaluate_wash, washer_id, status, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, evaluate_info from work_evaluate where evaluate_no = #{EvaluateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select woe_id, evaluate_no, evaluate_by, evaluate_type, evaluate_date, enabled_mark, wpo_id, auditor_by, auditor_date, evaluate_consultant, consultant_id, evaluate_supervisor, supervisor_id, evaluate_wash, washer_id, status, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, evaluate_info from work_evaluate

SELECT eva.*, wpo.create_date as serviceDate from work_evaluate eva left join work_pickup_order wpo on wpo.wpo_id = eva.wpo_id where eva.consultant_id = #{consultantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY eva.evaluate_date DESC
LIMIT #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT eva.*, wpo.create_date as serviceDate from work_evaluate eva left join work_pickup_order wpo on wpo.wpo_id = eva.wpo_id where wpo.receive_by = #{supervisorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY eva.evaluate_date DESC
LIMIT #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT eva.*, wr.receive_date as serviceDate from work_evaluate eva left join work_repair wr on wr.work_repair_no = eva.evaluate_no where eva.evaluate_type = 2 and wr.repair_supervisor = #{shopSupervisorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY eva.evaluate_date DESC
LIMIT #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT eva.*, wash.receive_date as serviceDate from work_evaluate eva left join work_wash wash on wash.work_wash_no = eva.evaluate_no where eva.evaluate_type = 1 and wash.group_leader = #{washLeaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY eva.evaluate_date DESC
LIMIT #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT count(eva.woe_id) from work_evaluate eva left join work_pickup_order wpo on wpo.wpo_id = eva.wpo_id where wpo.receive_by = #{supervisorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT count(eva.woe_id) from work_evaluate eva left join work_repair wr on wr.work_repair_no = eva.evaluate_no where eva.evaluate_type = 2 and wr.repair_supervisor = #{shopSupervisorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT count(eva.woe_id) from work_evaluate eva left join work_wash wash on wash.work_wash_no = eva.evaluate_no where eva.evaluate_type = 1 and wash.group_leader = #{washLeaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT a.total, b.good FROM (SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR) AS total FROM work_evaluate WHERE consultant_id = #{consultantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) a, (SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR) AS good FROM work_evaluate WHERE consultant_id = #{consultantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and evaluate_consultant > 3) b

SELECT a.total, b.sum FROM (SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR) AS total FROM work_evaluate WHERE consultant_id = #{consultantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) a, (SELECT CAST(SUM(evaluate_consultant) AS CHAR) AS sum FROM work_evaluate WHERE consultant_id = #{consultantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) b
